titleStmt.title: A triumphant arch erected and consecrated to the glory of the feminine sexe: by Monsieur de Scudery: Englished by I.B. gent.
titleStmt.author: Scudéry, Madeleine de, 1607-1701.
I. B.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for William Hope, and Henry Herringman, at the blew Anchor behind the Old Exchange, and at the blew Anchor in the lower walk in the New Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
